reviews.review_text: This mirror is hung in the hallway near my backdoor and guest bathroom Absolutely STUNNING! Woodgrain is HIGH QUALITY...heavy so needs to be professionally installed Highly recommend this mirror. Use it daily to ensure I am presentable upon leaving and enetering my home. 5 STAR!

reviews.title: Magnificent Mirror!!
reviews.review_text: This mirror is the perfect size! It's big enough, but not imposing. I use it as a dressing mirror in my closet, but it would be beautiful in any space. It's sturdy and very well made. The frame is very straight and doesn't bend when being moved. I'm very pleased with this purchase!

reviews.title: Mirror %26 Frame Quality Excellent!
reviews.review_text: This mirror is surprisingly well made for the price. The frame is solid and heavy. The mirror is nice quality, no waves. It is meant to sit on the floor and lean on the wall. I thought it could also hang on the wall but the instructions advise not to hang it on a wire. If you want a floor mirror I definitely recommend it.

reviews.title: Tall!
reviews.review_text: I purchased this mirror to replace another wall mirror I had purchased that was too short for me. I'm 5 foot 10 so a shorter mirror was not really ideal because I couldn't see my whole outfit from head to toe. This mirror is very tall and is perfect for what I was trying to achieve, which is a head to toe look. The gray frame looks very high-quality.

reviews.title: Beautiful mirror!
reviews.review_text: I've been looking for a floor mirror to accent my living room decor for quite some time. I saw this one at Walmart and thought it was perfect and had to have it. I waited a day to purchase it so I could measure my space then I ordered it online and picked it up the following day. This mirror was perfect for the space I put it in. It's very well-made and sturdy. The wood trim matches the furniture I already have. Although it is a floor standing mirror, It still came with all the hardware I needed to hang it on my wall.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.review_text: This mirror is exactly what it was advertised to be. I love the height and width. It can feel a bit flimsy but it's solid enough, hasn't fallen and looks great.

reviews.title: A Broken Mirror in a Box
reviews.review_text: I ordered this mirror and probably would have really liked it..however, when I received it, it was completely shattered as they sent it with no packing!! A mirror in a box!! I sent it back and asked for a replacement and have called Walmart multiple times and still have not received a refund or replacement!!

reviews.title: delivered broken
reviews.review_text: I had this mirror delivered, which could have been my first mistake. After seeing it in the store, I figured it would be more convenient to have it ordered through Walmart . The mirror was delivered in a damaged box; of course, the mirror was broken too. If bought in the store, though, the mirror is a nice size and it looks great.

reviews.title: 4 times Horrible customer service and packaging
reviews.review_text: I could not get the white one in the store so ordered on line, this mirror still has not made it to me in working condition, 4 have been delivered completely shattered. I was told by customer service they would reach out to the shipper to let them know it needs to be packaged better and still came in the same box broken each time! On top of that each time I had to purchase a new mirror and wait 10 days for my refund of the previous broken mirrors! Horrible customer service from Walmart! I will never order anything from Walmart again!

reviews.title: Damaged
reviews.review_text: When this mirror was delivered it was shattered into a million pieces . It was poorly packaged! No padding or bubble wrap or anything. I can't believe it was actually wrapped and shipped out that way! I shipped it back and was refunded in a timely manner. It's too bad because I really thought it was going to look good .

reviews.title: She's cute but mine was damaged
reviews.review_text: CAME DAMAGED SO PICKUP is best!!!!! :) Wish I would've picked it up bc it's cute for the size and price, wouldn't let me do a return without a replacement. So I'll just hang right w it and try to color match the scrapes

reviews.title: Questionable shipping
reviews.review_text: Cord and wall mounts were worthless, I had to install my own to mount my own. Mirror came scratched which was probably due to poor packaging. The mirror did not arrive wrapped, it was shipped just as you would purchase in the store.

reviews.title: Versatile/ you won't be disappointed
reviews.review_text: Just know that the frames seem to be made of ‚Äúchipboard/particle board.‚Äù This is our 5th one. I have 4 in grey and the most recent is the off white. I used one to go horizontally along my bathroom sink.

reviews.title: Love love love.
reviews.review_text: Stylish, huge and perfect in every way. I'm 300 lbs and I have no issues seeing every angle. Step back 2 feet and you're golden. It's heavy! Love it so much. The grey wood .. I'm obsessed. It's just leaning against my wall. No need to install here.

reviews.title: Pick It Up In Person
reviews.review_text: 0 stars for delivery. 5 stars for the product itself. I've purchased this mirror before in-store, and it's gorgeous/perfect, but i'm almost offended at how Walmart delivered this to my home. No Box, no protection, nothing that even says where it's from. Just a random, broken mirror. What's even more embarrassing is that FedEx refused to accept it as a return because of how bad the condition was. This is a beautiful mirror, just don't have it delivered. Go pick it up yourself.

I'm so disappointed! I ordered a mirror, and you brought me a crib mattress. Now, I'm having the hardest time trying to get it picked UP and returned by FED EX. Have re-scheduled twice and received a Fed ex phone call once, and its still sitting in my hallway...UGH!! I will be trying again tomorrow. wish I could give out zeros!!!

reviews.title: Adds a Designer Touch to my home.
reviews.review_text: This is the second 'leaner' mirror I have purchased from Walmart. I needed a full length mirror for two separate locations and didn't want to hang a mirror. This mirror is on trend and very easy to lean against a wall. I think it adds a designer touch to my locations.

reviews.title: Arrived damaged
reviews.review_text: This mirror would have been perfect, but it arrived very damaged. I am so disappointed. Their were a lot scuffs, and all of the corners were broken. Do better!!!! Have better packaging with a label on the outside that says fragile. Maybe even choose a better delivery service ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è I'm returning this product unfortunately.

reviews.title: White better homes, and gardens mirror
reviews.review_text: Bought this mirror for my daughter for college it's quite large so it may not fit in a normal packing situation but it's tall and wide enough and she loves it‚Ä¶ used as a leaning up against a wall mirror -heavy duty and sturdy not flimsy. And from an ordering standpoint. It came shipped directly to our home was packed, wonderfully with some Styrofoam and cardboard, supports, and no dents or dings. Would definitely recommend.!!
Exactly what I was looking for an upgrade from the standard small size mirror that you'd hang on the door. This is heavy and sturdy perfect shade of grey.

reviews.title: The perfect floor mirror!
reviews.review_text: This mirror is exactly what I was looking for. You can hang it or have it rest on the ground. You can completely see your outfit before you leave the house with this mirror!

reviews.title: Looks way more expensive than it is!
reviews.review_text: LOVE this mirror!! It looks way more expensive than it is!! I use it as a leaning mirror, and it looks perfect. My only caution is that there is only paper staples onto the frame behind the mirror, so very little protection, so handle carefully when you're moving it. But once in place, it's fine and looks awesome!

reviews.title: Very nice for the price
reviews.review_text: I'm happy with this mirror, especially for the price. I just wanted a nice looking full length mirror to lean against a bedroom wall. It's a good design‚Ä¶.understated, clean, simple, farmhouse style. I think it could be used in many different ways, in any room. Delivered with care too, which was greatly appreciated.

reviews.title: White mirror is off-white and has glazing
reviews.review_text: This is not a true solid white mirror as it looks in the picture. It is an off-white glazed effect. Very nice mirror though. If you are looking to match white furniture or molding, you may want to paint it. For the money, a little time painting would still be worth it.

reviews.title: Full length mirror
reviews.review_text: Love this mirror. Very ery nice, just as described and less expensive than furniture store similar product.

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.review_text: Love it! Love the length and everything, coming from a tall girl , this is perfect ! Definitely recommend.

reviews.title: No instructions or accessories to hang the mirror
reviews.review_text: The mirror is beautiful! It did not come with accessories to hang the mirror though! I had to go buy the clips and wire in which to hang the mirror.
I've bought 3 in the last 3 years and they've all been perfect! Gorgeous material and very good quality.

reviews.title: Must get
reviews.review_text: This is my second time purchasing this mirror . The first mirror i had for 3 years and it broke while moving , i went without one for 7 months and just couldn't do it anymore i had to get another one ! i love it
Thought I bought this in black but it came to me in gray. Couldn't be happier with that color once I had it. Looks to be more natural and similar to driftwood. Looks great and it's a nice size.

reviews.title: Nice mirror
reviews.review_text: I saw this mirror in Walmart but I didn't have enough room in my car to take home with me so I decided to order. It came on time and handle with care. Got it in Black. Nice and tall I'm only 5'1‚Äù and it gives full coverage of your outfit.
Excellent quality and price, couldn't find something similar anywhere else without ordering it online. Had a mirror shipped from Amazon and it arrived broken.... so I wanted to buy it in store.

reviews.title: Nice mirror, poor choice of packaging for shipping
reviews.review_text: It would have been a more worthwhile purchase if Wal-Mart hadn't have shipped it to me in a loose box. The mirror arrived with three out of four busted corners

reviews.title: NICE MIRROR
reviews.review_text: Very sturdy and heavy duty. Very nice mirror for the price! was honestly very impressed by the quality of the mirror. Definitely recommend. Perfect height

reviews.review_text: Love this mirror! It's huge and perfect. Heavy and firm. Hopefully will last a long time! I got a black one for the bathroom and the white one for my room.

reviews.title: Beautiful Elegant and Cost Effective
reviews.review_text: I love this mirror. I've been wanting to get a full length mirror for some time, but I wanted something that looked better than the basic ones that are probably used in college dorm rooms. I wanted something that looked modern and elegant and would work in any space; bedroom, living room, dining room or whatever. This mirror was perfect I had found other mirrors before but they were hundreds of dollars and had to be shipped. I wasn't comfortable with that option. I would suggest if you purchase this item get it from the store because I had it shipped and it arrived shattered fortunately I found a Walmart near me that had one in stock, so I returned mine and replaced it. I love it and it worked perfectly for the space I had planned for it.

reviews.title: Great Find
reviews.review_text: The Delivery was fast, Mirror in perfect condition. Much sturdier than I was expected, included hanging hardware as well as anti-slip hardware if you choose to use it as a leaning mirror, excellent quality, nice size frame around the mirror as well. Would recommend!

reviews.title: Large and very nice!
reviews.review_text: Wanted a full length mirror for the inside of our bathroom barn door. It's a big door and needs a big mirror, but the door is vinyl and we didn't want to drill into it so it needs to be light too. We have this mirror hung on adhesive hooks that claim to hold 44lbs each, but I'm keeping an eye on the hooks to ensure they're holding up. So far so good after about a month. I would guess the weight about 25lbs. We had the mirror delivered and it arrived with the frame broken. We ended up having to go to another store to get another one and noticed that one on the floor was broken in the same place. I recommend going to the store and making sure the frame isn't broken before you purchase. Now it's up I love it!!

reviews.title: Mirror

Then bough a second mirror and the delivery man left it at the apartment office with the mirror broken which also appeared on the verified photo he took as an evident he delivered a broken mirror. Very disappointed on the second purchase. The quality is not bad compared to the price. But the service and the rectangular shape is not also perfect.

reviews.title: Lying about delivery date (delaying)
reviews.review_text: Walmart false advertise with the shipment dates, this is my second time buying this mirror, and my second time that my item keeps on delaying. If they're not going to deliver it when they say they're going to deliver it before ordering, they don't need to have this item on the market! because lying about the delivery is unacceptable

Was looking for a full length mirror for my son but couldn't find anything that was decently priced which was the end all factor for me. Happened to be in store at Walmart and saw this mirror. Finally decided on ordering it online as it checked most of the boxes‚Ä¶ full length, budget friendly, black trim‚Ä¶ free shipping so no hassle fitting it into a car as well as the driver being dropped to an upstairs unit. We're super pleased and would buy again.

reviews.title: Purchased it and never received
reviews.review_text: I have purchased this mirror three times and have never received one mirror. My orders have been cancelled twice and lost in shipping once. Unreal how an item is put on the website for purchasing and just can't seem to actually receive the product. Frustrating.

reviews.title: Beautiful Mirror
reviews.review_text: Beautiful mirror! I think at least one full length mirror is an absolute necessity in my bedroom, I need to check how I look before work every day and I need a full length mirror to do it. This mirror works perfectly, of course, but it's also a very great size and it's absolutely beautiful with the gray wood sides. It's not the thickest mirror I own, it has some wobble and should be firmly attached to the wall, but I love it and it fits in perfectly in my home and would work with many different decors. Fantastic addition to your home, you won't regret this purchase.

reviews.title: HUGE mirror ...LUV
reviews.review_text: Funny story. I picked up the mirror and lo and behold, this thing was GIANT! I know I read the description and size BUT I didn't even imagine it was going to be this BIG! What a great looking full-mirror. Comes with screws and hooks in the back and pretty sturdy too. A little heavy too. It took 3 men (gentlemen by the curbside for Walmart's pick up) to get it in my little car! Happy with the purchase!

reviews.title: Great size and look for the price!
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised at how nice this is considering the price and size of the mirror!! It is definitely lighter but does a great job leaning against the wall. I was hesitant to get a large mirror but also didn't want to spend a lot, this was the perfect compromise! Would buy again!!

reviews.title: Beautiful oversized mirror
reviews.review_text: I love this mirror and it's actually my 2nd time buying. I moved and the first one broke in the move and I was really scared I would not be able to locate another one. Hope to be able to hang them on the wall but waiting to see if I can get someone to ensure there is a good beam for it as it is a little heavy.

reviews.title: Inspect
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure if they were damaged by the person that delivered them or if they were that way at the store‚Ä¶. but one of the issues I had was the hanging brackets were off by 1/8 of an inch so it hung crooked. It took me ordering 6 returning 4 to get 2 good ones.

reviews.title: Perfect!!!!
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant for a couple of months by reading the not so good reviews and me not having a car to get it, from the store to my home. . I gave in and ordered online yesterday for next day delivery. No scratches and not one crack. The delivery person was very careful and kind. I highly recommend this mirror and to never base your decision on bad reviews.

reviews.title: Beautiful Mirror
reviews.review_text: This mirror is both big and beautiful! While I know the dimensions, I was still very surprised of the size. It's a substantial piece, and the width of the frame makes the mirror really standout. Love the gray color and it compliments a hutch I have in the same room.

reviews.title: Full length mirror
reviews.review_text: This mirror is very good quality, it is nice, heavy and sturdy. This mirror is 27x70 and black. It comes with screws in case you may want to hang it on the wall. This mirror can go vertical or horizontal. I have this mirror for my Daughter in her room. Which this mirror would go perfect in any room of the house. We are not planning on hanging it so we have it at an angle up against the wall which she prefers. We love this is a full mirror because we can see our full body. The mirror is easy to clean also.

reviews.title: Beautiful Mirror!
reviews.review_text: This Better Homes & Gardens 27 x 70 Rectangular Full Length Gray Mirror is a beautiful addition to my home. Its exactly what I was looking for. It is a great sized full length mirror and the gray color is perfect. It almost looks like weathered wood. It is made very well and seems sturdy. It's not too heavy so I can move it around pretty easily. I love that you have the option to hang it or just lean it up against the wall. I'm just leaning it so that I have the option to move it around.

Excellent product for the price! These mirrors sell out FAST and I was thrilled I was able to get 3 at the same time. The delivery person was very careful to make sure the mirrors were placed in a safe location and were free from defects or scratches. Would highly recommend this product.

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.review_text: I love the mirror. I'm about 5'5-5'6 and my whole body fits in the frame. The only thing I would say is that I wish it had an option of black but it's an easy project to turn it that color. For 62 dollars plus tax, you are getting an amazing deal because a mirror like this would've been 100 plus at any other furniture/outlet store. GET THIS MIRROR!!!

reviews.title: Great Body length Mirror
reviews.review_text: I was a little nervous getting it shipped as it's a large breakable item but it was packaged very will and arrived without any damage. It's a very stable mirror and doesn't feel flemsy like some of the other mirror's i've purchased before. The wood frame has a nice finish to it and provides a nice look to any style of room. Would definetly recomend this mirror.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.review_text: I went to the store a few times to check out this mirror. It's large and doesn't fit in a cart well so I never got it. Eventually I purchased it online and picked it up at the store. Looks great at the end of our hallway. Very happy with my purchase.

reviews.title: Nice mirror But cracked
reviews.review_text: It's a beautiful mirror, it looks grand but it was delivered cracked in the bottom corner. The plastic is cracked. It's too much of a hassle to return so I just turned it upside down. I am afraid to hang the mirror in the wall so it's just propped up against the wall.

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.review_text: We have lived in our current home for two years now without a full length mirror! We were in deprecate need of one. I was super excited to get this. Overall it's a nice enough mirror. It isn't very thick and sturdy though. I wouldn't want to move with it, but it fits our needs and does a full length reflection just fine! The color is beautiful and fits our home well. And I like the thick border. It's adds a higher value appearance.

Was looking for a somewhat reasonable price on a larger full length mirror for my bedroom. The price was right, as I compared to other places with different brands. It's cute and matches my style. It also has great quality to the mirror and not distorted like some larger mirrors can be.

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review_text: Love this huge mirror. The image is not distorted, or warped like some larger mirrors do. The frame seems very nice and sturdy. Very solid. The packaging on this was crazy. You need a very large area to unpackage this, and it is a lot of work, but it's what you want for a giant mirror being shipped to arrive in nice condition.

Like the look. It's not thick or solid so it wobbles around when you move it. But I've leaned it against my wall and it's stable. Good value for money.
